sentences.en: Both readers commend Knutson for his scrupulous attention to detail.
sentences.cn: 两位读者都称赞克努森对细节一丝不苟。

sentences.en: Colleagues, I commend this report to you.
sentences.cn: 各位同事，我向你们推荐这份报告。

sentences.en: From this respect, pipelining has everything to commend it.
sentences.cn: 从这点来说, 管路乐于被人们采用.

sentences.en: His ideas do not commend themselves to me.
sentences.cn: 他的看法没给我留下好的印象.

sentences.en: His suggestions do not commend themselves to the committee.
sentences.cn: 他的建议不会被委员会接受.

sentences.en: I commend all those who are today graduating.
sentences.cn: 我赞扬今天的所有毕业生.

sentences.en: I commend her to your notice.
I should like to commend this method to you.
sentences.cn: 我想向您推荐这一方法.

sentences.en: I'd like to commend him to my friends.
sentences.cn: 我愿意把他推荐给我的朋友们.

sentences.en: It is very kind of you to commend me to your father.
sentences.cn: 请代我向令尊致意,不胜感激.

sentences.en: She is owing to has collectivism spirit to suffer to commend.
sentences.cn: 她由于有集体主义精神而受到表彰.

sentences.en: The paper was highly commended in the UK Press Awards.
sentences.cn: 该报获得了“英国新闻奖”的高度褒奖。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister's initiative has much to commend it.
sentences.cn: 首相的新方案有不少令人赞许之处。
这些报道赞扬了她的勇敢。

sentences.en: This TV play does not seem to commend itself to me.
sentences.cn: 这部电视剧给我的印象似乎不好.

sentences.en: We should commend good people and good deeds.
sentences.cn: 我们应当表扬好人好事.

sentences.en: You can neither blame nor commend him without some twinge of conscience.
sentences.cn: 你无论是责备他或是称赞他,良心上总不免有点刺痛的意味似的.

words.tran_cn: 值得赞美的；很好的；可推荐的

trans.tran_en: to praise or approve of someone or something publicly

trans.tran_cn: 称赞， 表扬； 推荐
trans.tran_en: to praise or approve of someone or something publicly
